modName: DDD - Another Main Menu Theme Music Replacer
summary: People seemed to enjoy my first menu music replacer, so here is another one for you! An orchestral piece I made a few years ago.
descriptionHtml:
-RE-UPLOADED BECAUSE IT BUGGED OUT! GAH!-

People seemed to enjoy my first menu music replacer, so here is another one for you!

Orchestral piece I made a few years ago.

This one is called \"The Lost\" and is shorter than my other one, found here:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6103

You can listen to it here:
http://soundcloud.com/protoneutro/the-lost

----------

Attention!!!
This is my own music work, so don\'t you dare upload it to any other sites. I reserve full copyrights over this.

Break this simple rule and I will hunt you down and proceed to shout you into non-existence with a real thu\'um...
author: Demidekidasu
